xmlText.p: First Period_1, Edmonton, McDavid 18 (Klefbom, Strome), 1:48 (pp). 2, Tampa Bay, Killorn 8 (Gourde), 9:42. 3, Edmonton, Draisaitl 13 (McDavid, Strome), 17:24 (pp). Penalties_Kucherov, TB, (slashing), 1:21; Stamkos, TB, (tripping), 16:22; Draisaitl, EDM, (interference), 19:48.

Second Period_4, Edmonton, McDavid 19 (Benning, Draisaitl), 2:33. 5, Edmonton, Pakarinen 1 (Slepyshev, Letestu), 12:59. Penalties_Dotchin, TB, (tripping), 10:07; Namestnikov, TB, (delay of game), 16:19; Draisaitl, EDM, (slashing), 16:30; Hedman, TB, (slashing), 16:30.

Third Period_6, Tampa Bay, Gourde 19 (Johnson), 1:54 (pp). 7, Edmonton, McDavid 20, 6:55. 8, Edmonton, McDavid 21 (Cammalleri, Draisaitl), 13:49. Penalties_Strome, EDM, (holding), 0:48; Khaira, EDM, (holding), 11:07.

Goalies_Tampa Bay, Vasilevskiy 31-10-2 (26 shots-22 saves), Domingue 2-7-0 (9-7). Edmonton, Talbot 19-17-2 (34-32).
